items.sentence: You often need to spend more time doing something than you anticipated.
I just heard that Tom and Mary are coming back to Boston for Christmas.
I studied French when I was seven, but now I only remember a few words.
There are three health food stores within walking distance of my house.
Tickets are $30 for general admission and $20 for students and seniors.
Tom donated money to the Red Cross to help survivors of the earthquake.
I think it\'ll cost you more than 10,000 yen to have this camera fixed.
If I speak French, most of the people in the room won\'t understand me.
The police couldn\'t find any footprints outside Tom\'s bedroom window.
I noticed that Tom was doing something he wasn\'t supposed to be doing.
